description: Jessy Ares is facing a difficult decision. Due to sales being down, his boss has given him the chance to keep his job or fire his best friend, Dani Robles. Jessy decides to take the honest route and tell Dani of the choice that lay in front of him. Jessy is a married man with a family, Dani is a young and hot single guy. Dani accepts his fate but is able to see the positive in this outcome due to them no longer being boss and employee; they are now just two men who can fuck without any consequences.
title: Decisions
